Camden.Woodlynne School District:
The Woodlynne School District is a community public school district that serves students in pre-kindergarten through eighth grade from Woodlynne, in Camden County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the district and its one school had an enrollment of 570 students and 33.0 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 17.3:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "B", the second-lowest of eight groupings.
